Title: Allows for Genesis Villella to qualify for and receive certain spousal accidental death benefits
Summary: Allows for Genesis Villella to qualify for and receive certain spousal accidental death benefits; splits such benefit equally between Genesis Villella and dependents Deliliah Vega and Peter Vega for the rest of such dependents' lifetimes, once the youngest dependent reaches the age of twenty-five.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to allowing for Genesis Villella to qualify for and receive certain spousal accidental death benefits
